title: Sunglasses Roundup: Scicon AeroWing Lamon, Limar, Sweet Protection, Bollé AI
content:
Summer riding & racing brings tons of new options for keeping the sun out of your eyes with several new pairs of sunglasses from Scicon, Limar, Sweet Protection, and Bollé. Getting a race debut on the Tour de France yellow jersey wearer are the shapely new Scicon AeroWing Lamon sunglasses, plus full-coverage Limar Caos/Argo/Theros shades, […]

The post Sunglasses Roundup: Scicon AeroWing Lamon, Limar, Sweet Protection, Bollé AI appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
